text: Edgar Dyson (16 October 1883 - 23 February 1937) was a British gymnast. He competed in the men's artistic individual all-around event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1883 births Category:1937 deaths Category:British male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Great Britain Category:Gymnasts at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Halifax, West Yorkshire
title: Edgar Dyson
